issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Dates in cloud formation responses omit milliseconds when there are trailing zeros:

{code}
# euform-describe-stacks --debug
2014-11-12 10:32:45,329 DEBUG   DescribeStacks parsed arguments: {'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': None, 'show_long': False, 'StackName': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None}
2014-11-12 10:32:45,329 INFO    Config finding global option default-region
2014-11-12 10:32:45,329 INFO    Config   novalue for default-region
2014-11-12 10:32:45,329 INFO    Config finding global option max-retries
2014-11-12 10:32:45,329 INFO    Config   novalue for max-retries
2014-11-12 10:32:45,329 INFO    Config finding global option timeout
2014-11-12 10:32:45,329 INFO    Config   novalue for timeout
2014-11-12 10:32:45,333 INFO    DescribeStacks parameters: {'Action': 'DescribeStacks', 'Version': '2010-05-15'}
2014-11-12 10:32:45,333 INFO    CloudFormation sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2014-11-12 10:32:45,335 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.111.5.113:8773\n/services/CloudFormation\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIKZHVOP7ECUHARA5GN&Action=DescribeStacks&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2014-11-12T18%3A32%3A45Z&Version=2010-05-15'
2014-11-12 10:32:45,335 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: deu0W97IblW2SUq282DODChP9nlzWOzu/yBmCioVA/w=
2014-11-12 10:32:45,335 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data
2014-11-12 10:32:45,345 DEBUG   CloudFormation request method: POST
2014-11-12 10:32:45,345 DEBUG   CloudFormation request url:    http://10.111.5.113:8773/services/CloudFormation
2014-11-12 10:32:45,346 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: Content-Length: 218
2014-11-12 10:32:45,346 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2014-11-12 10:32:45,346 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: Host: 10.111.5.113:8773
2014-11-12 10:32:45,346 DEBUG   CloudFormation request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.1.0-2-g825506e (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-504.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.1 requests/1.1.0
2014-11-12 10:32:45,346 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: AKIKZHVOP7ECUHARA5GN
2014-11-12 10:32:45,346 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Action: DescribeStacks
2014-11-12 10:32:45,346 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Signature: deu0W97IblW2SUq282DODChP9nlzWOzu/yBmCioVA/w=
2014-11-12 10:32:45,346 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2014-11-12 10:32:45,347 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2014-11-12 10:32:45,347 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Timestamp: 2014-11-12T18:32:45Z
2014-11-12 10:32:45,347 DEBUG   CloudFormation request data:   Version: 2010-05-15
2014-11-12 10:32:45,399 DEBUG   CloudFormation response time: 0.051 seconds
2014-11-12 10:32:45,399 INFO    CloudFormation response status: 200
2014-11-12 10:32:45,399 DEBUG   CloudFormation response header: content-length: 1221
2014-11-12 10:32:45,399 DEBUG   CloudFormation response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8

<DescribeStacksResponse xmlns="http://cloudformation.amazonaws.com/doc/2010-05-15/"><DescribeStacksResult><Stacks><member><CreationTime>2014-11-12T18:30:46Z</CreationTime><Description>Simple stack with a security group</Description><DisableRollback>false</DisableRollback><LastUpdatedTime>2014-11-12T18:30:52.715Z</LastUpdatedTime><Outputs/><Parameters/><StackId>arn:aws:cloudformation::597671164106:stack/gstack1/01e8665e-d41a-49b6-a798-2a971e880bb1</StackId><StackName>gstack1</StackName><StackStatus>CREATE_COMPLETE</StackStatus><StackStatusReason>Complete!</StackStatusReason></member><member><CreationTime>2014-11-12T18:32:03.266Z</CreationTime><Description>Simple stack with a security group</Description><DisableRollback>false</DisableRollback><LastUpdatedTime>2014-11-12T18:32:08.652Z</LastUpdatedTime><Outputs/><Parameters/><StackId>arn:aws:cloudformation::597671164106:stack/gstack2/6ba22efe-5bdb-46f9-8b2b-cfc23a7cc217</StackId><StackName>gstack2</StackName><StackStatus>CREATE_COMPLETE</StackStatus><StackStatusReason>Complete!</StackStatusReason></member></Stacks></DescribeStacksResult><ResponseMetadata><RequestId>09fca829-afb9-4b63-b865-952c39deb590</RequestId></ResponseMetadata></DescribeStacksResponse>

comments.body: Fix Verified per [~hspencer] refer to coment https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/browse/EUCA-10152?focusedCommentId=80848&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-80848
